33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Bakr As-Siddiq said:"O you people! You recite this Ayah: Take care of yourselves! If you follow the guidance no harm shall come to you. I indeed heard the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) saying: 'When the people see the wrongdoer and they do not take him by the hand, then soon Allah shall envelope you in a punishment from him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي نُزُولِ الْعَذَابِ إِذَا لَمْ يُغَيَّرِ الْمُنْكَرُ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About The Descent of The Punishment When Evil is not Changed
